creator: eric.jain@gmail.com
text:
Currently, there is only a 'toDir' attribute. While it is possible to rename a 
file after copying, this strategy is problematic when retrieving several files 
with the same name in parallel.

  <scp
    file="${user}@${host}:/var/log/httpd/access_log"
    tofile="${host}_access_log"
    password="${pass}"
    trust="yes"
  />
